item.title: 'Not our role': Lawmakers cautious over Middle East peace, not ready for regime change
item.description: After U.S. strikes on Iran's nuclear program, lawmakers laud the President Donald Trump-negotiated Israel-Iran ceasefire but remain wary of Iran.

item.title: Timeline: Trump's Israel-Iran ceasefire nearly collapses hours after announcement
item.description: A President Donald Trump-brokered Israel-Iran ceasefire nearly fell apart with Israel launching attacks after announcement but before implementation, ...

item.title: Jasmine Crockett drops out of race for top House Oversight Committee Democrat
item.description: Rep. Jasmine Crockett told reporters she would be bowing out of the race to replace late Rep. Gerry Connolly as the top Democrat on House Oversight.

item.title: Trump admin 'obliterated' Iranian nuclear facilities with slimmed down NSC team, Rubio juggling multiple jobs

item.title: Trump's Iran strikes follow long pattern of presidents sidestepping Congress
item.description: Former President Barack Obama is among several presidents who have ordered military actions similar to President Donald Trump's and attracted backlash...
